title: The new Moxie intro
body: Now that we're showing our trailers on the digital projector before the movie, I can finally start using The Moxie's theme song to make crazy little intros. The first one will run in front of THE SCIENCE OF SLEEP, which opens tonight... and guess what?! HERE IT IS RIGHT HERE FOR ALL TO SEE!!!!!!1 It looks a lot better on the big screen - you can actually read the scrolling text without getting a headache. The big question is this: how long will it be before George Lucas sues us into the ground? Either way, enjoy it while you can. UPDATE: I forgot to mention this earlier, but the intro may one day evolve into the "Little Superstar" clip, which I watch at least 18 times a day. I'm still working on my slow motion dance walk.
author: Dan

comments.author: nate
comments.body: Where did that theme song come from?

comments.author: dan
comments.body: JR made it, about a year and a half ago... see.

comments.author: Master RJ
comments.body: But I liked that you didn't have an intro. Who needs intros anyway?

comments.author: Caleb
comments.body:
Oh, RJ.

I love the intro. As did all 65 other people in the crowd on Wednesday night I think. Lots of laughs. Lots of cheers. It can only get better from here.

I'm going to have a nightmare about that other clip tonight though. Hilarious yes, but also freakishly disturbing.

comments.author: Decoy
comments.body: That was five and a half different flavors of amazing.
